content.text:
# 2011 Jade Solid Gold Awards

The 2011 Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation () was held on January 8, 2012. It is part of the Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation series.
Top 10 song awards
The top 10 songs (十大勁歌金曲) of 2011 are as follows.
{|class="wikitable"
! width=40% | Song name in Chinese
! width=40% | Artist
|-
| "華麗舞台" || Grasshopper
|-
| "天梯" || C AllStar
|-
| "水百合" || Ivana Wong
|-
| "Chok" || Raymond Lam
|-
| "一再問究竟" || Edmond Leung
|-
| "花千樹" || Joey Yung
|-
| "爆了" || Leo Ku
|-
| "仍然" || Jade Kwan
|-
| "戀上外星人" || Julian Cheung
|-
| "年年" || Charlene Choi
|-
|}
